meanings.sent1: The river flowed freely under the unbridged gap.
meanings.sent2: The unbridged stream was difficult to cross.
meanings.sent3: The unbridged gap made the journey more adventurous.
meanings.sent4: Her unbridged excitement led her to take risks.
meanings.sent5: The unbridged chasm seemed to stretch endlessly.

meanings.sent2: The unbridged horse galloped wildly through the field.
meanings.sent3: The unbridged child's energy was endless.
meanings.sent4: Her unbridged emotions spilled out uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The unbridged river surged with untamed power.
